name: vtxnbuvtx
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))))

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))), wcel(c0, c2))
stmt.pretty: simprbi(c0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c1), ∀(s0 ∈(c2 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)), c0 ∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈(c2 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)))
⊣ (c0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c1)↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c2 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈(c1[NeighbVtx]c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈(c2 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)))
⊣ (c0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c1)↔(c0 ∈ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c2 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈(c1[NeighbVtx]c0))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0)))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuvtx, c1)), wral(s0, cdif(c2, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cnbgr, c0))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cvtx, c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(UnivVtx ` c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈(c2 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈(c1[NeighbVtx]c0)))
⊣ c2 =(Vtx ` c1)
⊣ d(s0, c0)
⊣ d(s0, c1)
⊣ d(s0, c2)

comment: A universal vertex has all other vertices as neighbors. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 14-Feb-2022.)
